description: Create a unified offseason hub page at /dashboard/offseason that guides users through the complete offseason experience: Scouting, Free Agency, Draft, and Rookie Camp as a connected flow.
goal: Provide a hub page approach where users can navigate between offseason activities in a logical progression, rather than having them scattered across the dashboard.
requirements: Create /dashboard/offseason hub page with navigation to all offseason activities
Scouting page for prospect evaluation and draft board building
Free Agency page for signing free agents
Draft page integration (already exists, needs linking)
Visual progress indicators showing offseason phase status
out_of_scope: Contract negotiations and salary cap details
constraints: Mobile-first UI - must work well on phone screens
Reuse existing components where possible (draft components, rookie camp)
Stay within current sessionStorage limits (no additional large data stores)
